short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the websites that are blocking you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just add the url of a website (without the http(s)://) and it will be blocked! 
You can add multiple url, one by line - and to remove the block, just delete the line. No data is being collected - it is ugly and it just blocks
